channel.title: disease development on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in disease development on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnHva22c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA07g26710D Gene Symbol: BnHva22c Gene Name: HVA22-like protein c Genome: Darmor-bzh v10 Genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Knock-out of BnHva22c reduces the susceptibility of Brassica napus to infection with the fungal pathogen Verticillium longisporum.

item.title: BnHva22c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnC06g27930D Gene Symbol: BnHva22c Gene Name: HVA22-like protein c Genome: Darmor-bzh v10 Genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Knock-out of BnHva22c reduces the susceptibility of Brassica napus to infection with the fungal pathogen Verticillium longisporum.

item.title: CsExo70B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_1G036490.1 Gene Symbol: CsExo70B Gene Name: exocytosis subunit Exo70B Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v3 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Our work reveals a regulatory mechanism that CsExo70B promotes both fruit elongation and disease resistance by maintaining appropriate RK levels at the PM.

item.title: MtERF1-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtERF1-1 Gene Name: B-3 Ethylene Response Factor Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The B-3 Ethylene Response Factor MtERF1-1 Mediates Resistance to a Subset of Root Pathogens in Medicago truncatula without Adversely Affecting Symbiosis with Rhizobia.

item.title: MusaENODL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma11_g13300.1 Gene Symbol: MusaENODL3 Gene Name: Genome: banana genome A Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: Targeted knockout of early nodulin-like 3 (MusaENODL3) gene in banana reveals its function in resistance to Xanthomonas wilt disease.

item.title: ScWRKY4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ScWRKY4 Gene Name: Saccharum hybrid cultivar ROC22 WRKY transcription factor 4 Genome: Species: Saccharum spontaneum Functional Descriptions: ScWRKY4 is involved in growth and development and in defense against biotic stresses in sugarcane.
